TextLibrary.Text: Gruulkar
You are beaten, Gruulkar. Do two things for me and I will spare your miserable life.
You are beaten, Gruulkar. Do two things for me and I will spare your miserable life.
You are beaten, Gruulkar. Do two things for me and I will spare your miserable life.
You are beaten, Gruulkar. Do two things for me and I will spare your miserable life.
Rrrgghhh! Tell me what you want, little man, and I will go back to Gruuldok.
Rrrgghhh! Tell me what you want, little man, and I will go back to Gruuldok.
Rrrgghhh! Tell me what you want, little girl, and I will go back to Gruuldok.
Rrrgghhh! Tell me what you want, little girl, and I will go back to Gruuldok.
First, you will not attack Dhun-Kor. Take your army and go home.
First, you will not attack Dhun-Kor. Take your army and go home.
First, you will not attack Dhun-Kor. Take your army and go home.
First, you will not attack Dhun-Kor. Take your army and go home.
Bah! Dhun-Kor was not worth the trouble anyway. And the second thing?
Bah! Dhun-Kor was not worth the trouble anyway. And the second thing?
Bah! Dhun-Kor was not worth the trouble anyway. And the second thing?
Bah! Dhun-Kor was not worth the trouble anyway. And the second thing?
Tell me ALL you know of the creatures giving orders to the Orc Slavers.
Tell me ALL you know of the creatures giving orders to the Orc Slavers.
Tell me ALL you know of the creatures giving orders to the Orc Slavers.
Tell me ALL you know of the creatures giving orders to the Orc Slavers.

Very well. It is a beast like a Minotaur, but made of metal. Not metal plates like armor, but gears and springs. The Orcs call it the Mechataur. It lives north of Kor in a place known as the Hornburg.

Good. Now, get lost!
Good. Now, get lost!
